The Looney Tunes Show - Season 2 - Episode 21 (WEB-DL - 720p)
-------------------------------------------------------------

Screen icons Bugs Bunny and Daffy Duck continue the fun in season two of

together on a suburban cul-de-sac, our favorite mismatched roommates hit
the ground laughing, along with beloved Looney Tunes characters from the
first season, including Porky, Lola, Speedy, Tina and many more. This season,
find out what happens when Bugs becomes addicted to PorkyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s buttery catering,
or when Gossamer turns into a frog after Lola mistakes the WitchÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s spell book

Produced by Warner Bros. Animation.

Daffy is highly insulted when he discovers that ducks are not included
in the Chinese zodiac. In an attempt to make ducks more popular, he talks
Tina into entering a local beauty pageant. Meanwhile, Porky thinks it's the
Chinese Year of the Pig, and is convinced he should host the pageant to
capitalize on it being "his time".
